courseDetails.title: SPSS: A Practical Guide to Data Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Data Import; Descriptive Statistics; Charts, Variance and Regression Analysis for Research and Business Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: IBM SPSS: A Practical Guide to Data Analysis by MTF Institute


Become a data analysis expert with "IBM SPSS: A Practical Guide to Data Analysis." This course offers a practical, hands-on approach to mastering IBM SPSS, guiding you from importing raw data to confidently interpreting and presenting your results. Designed for both beginners and intermediate users, you'll learn essential SPSS techniques including data import, descriptive statistics, creating insightful charts and graphs, data transformation, exploring correlations and regression, comparing group means with t-tests and ANOVA, and an introduction to multivariate analysis. Crucially, you'll develop the skills to accurately interpret SPSS output, focusing on effect sizes and practical significance to communicate data-driven insights effectively. Enroll now and unlock the power of your data!


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 216 countries and has been chosen by more than 750 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Unlock the power of your data with this practical IBM SPSS course! Designed for beginners and intermediate learners, this course takes you step-by-step from importing your raw data into IBM SPSS to confidently interpreting and presenting your findings. You'll gain hands-on skills in essential SPSS techniques, enabling you to extract meaningful insights for your research, academic projects, or professional reports.

We'll start with the fundamentals: navigating the SPSS environment and efficiently importing data from various sources. You'll then master descriptive statistics to summarise and understand your data's basic characteristics. Learn to create compelling and informative charts and graphs to visualize patterns and trends.

This course goes beyond the basics, equipping you with essential data transformation methods to prepare your data for analysis. You'll delve into the world of relationships between variables, exploring correlations and regression. You'll also learn to perform t-tests and ANOVA to compare group means, and gain an introduction to powerful multivariate analysis techniques.

But this course isn't just about running the numbers. A core focus is on interpreting your SPSS output correctly. You'll learn to move beyond simply reporting p-values, and instead, focus on effect sizes, confidence intervals, and the practical significance of your results. This will enable you to tell a compelling and data-driven story.

By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the SPSS skills and the interpretive expertise to confidently analyze data, communicate your findings effectively, and make data-backed decisions.
targetAudiences: Students, researchers, and professionals who need to analyze data for reports, theses, or business decisions.

courseDetails.title: Python for Scientific Research
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Python for Scientific Research with Practical Examples
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you looking for a powerful and versatile tool to enhance your research capabilities? This course is your gateway to mastering Python for scientific research, where you'll learn through real-world examples across various fields.

As an Assistant Professor of Remote Sensing and a Senior GBD Collaborator with over a decade of experience in Python, R programming, and Big Data, I am excited to guide you on this journey. With a Ph.D. in Geography (Remote Sensing) and over 60 peer-reviewed publications, I bring extensive expertise in data analysis, remote sensing, and climate studies to help you excel.

In this course, you'll gain hands-on experience in:

  • Data Manipulation: Learn to import, export, and manipulate data efficiently using Python.

  • Statistical Analysis: Master techniques like descriptive statistics, multi-correlation, ANOVA, and t-tests.

  • Graph Creation: Create basic, advanced, and animated graphs to visualize your research findings.

This course is designed to not only make you proficient in Python but also empower you to use your creativity in data processing and analysis. Unlike restrictive software like SPSS or Excel, Python offers unlimited possibilities, allowing you to tailor your research tools to your specific needs.

Each lecture is crafted to provide you with actionable insights that you can apply immediately in your research. By the end of the course, you’ll be able to confidently use Jupyter Notebook for scientific research and develop custom Python scripts to tackle complex research challenges.

Take the first step towards elevating your research with Python. Enroll today, and let's unlock the full potential of your research capabilities together.

Sincerely,

Assist. Prof. Azad Rasul
targetAudiences: Researchers and students who are attempting to efficiently use Python programming for their scientific research.

courseDetails.title: AI Recruitment: Automating Optimizing Hiring Processes [EN]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Automation | Sourcing Tech | Talent Acquisition | HR Tech | Candidate Outreach | ChatGPT | Predictive Analytics | ATS
courseDetails.longDescription:
The “AI in Recruiting and Sourcing” course at Mike Pritula Academy is designed to equip HR professionals, recruiters, and sourcers with the knowledge and skills to effectively integrate artificial intelligence into their recruitment processes. By leveraging AI tools, participants can enhance efficiency, attract high-quality candidates, and maintain a competitive edge in the talent acquisition landscape.


What You’ll Learn:

• AI Opportunities and Trends in Recruiting and Sourcing: Gain an understanding of artificial intelligence and its role in modern recruiting, including the latest trends, innovations, and successful case studies.

• Optimizing Job Texts and Images with AI: Learn how AI assists in creating and refining job descriptions, analyzing and improving job advertisement appeal, and automatically generating optimized images for job postings.

• Automated Candidate Selection: Discover how AI enhances candidate search and selection processes, including tools and algorithms for automatic candidate matching and integration with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

• Sourcing and Candidate Communication Automation: Explore AI tools for automating candidate sourcing, communication, and personalized messaging to improve engagement and response rates.

• Candidate Assessment and Interview Analysis: Understand the application of AI in evaluating candidate competencies, conducting and analyzing interviews, and utilizing tools for transcription and objective assessment.

• Enhancing Employer Branding and Recruitment Marketing: Learn how AI strengthens employer branding, analyzes and improves candidate interactions, and automates recruitment marketing strategies.


Course Program:

1. AI Opportunities and Trends in Recruiting and Sourcing:

• Introduction to AI and its role in modern recruiting.

• Overview of the latest trends and innovations in AI for recruiting.

• Examples of successful AI applications in recruiting.

• Potential risks and challenges when using AI in recruiting.

• Future predictions and expectations in recruiting.

2. Working with Job Texts and Images for Job Postings:

• How AI helps create and optimize job descriptions.

• Using AI to analyze and improve the attractiveness of job advertisements.

• Automatically creating and optimizing images for job postings using AI.

• Practical examples and tools.

• Recommendations for creating effective job advertisements.

3. Automated Candidate Selection for Vacancies:

• How AI improves the process of searching and selecting candidates.

• Tools and algorithms for automatic candidate selection.

• Integration with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

• Practical cases of using AI for selection.

• Effective strategies and best practices.

4. Automation of Sourcing and Candidate Communication:

• AI tools for automating candidate sourcing.

• Plugins and tools to enhance communication with candidates.

• Automation of creating and sending email sequences.

• Examples of effective sourcing and communication techniques.

• Basics of creating personalized messages and emails.

5. Candidate Assessment and Interview Analysis:

• Application of AI for assessing candidates and their competencies.

• AI technologies in conducting and analyzing interviews.

• Tools for automatic transcription and interview analysis.

• Approaches to objective candidate assessment using AI.

• How to avoid bias in candidate assessment.

6. Enhancing Employer Branding and Recruitment Marketing:

• The role of AI in forming and strengthening the employer brand.

• Using AI to analyze and improve candidate interactions.

• Automation and optimization of recruitment marketing.

• Examples of successful recruitment marketing strategies.

• Planning and measuring the effectiveness of candidate attraction campaigns.


Course Features:

• Expert Instruction: Learn from Mike Pritula, a seasoned HR leader with extensive experience in integrating AI into recruitment and sourcing processes.

• Flexible Learning: Access six recorded lessons at your own pace.

• Practical Application: Complete homework assignments with personalized feedback to reinforce learning.

• Interactive Community: Join a dedicated Q&A chat to discuss topics and share experiences with peers.

• Certification: Receive a diploma upon successful completion of the course, enhancing your professional credentials.


Who Should Enroll:

• Recruiters and Sourcers: Professionals aiming to stay current with AI advancements in recruitment and sourcing.

• HR Specialists: Individuals seeking to enhance their efficiency and effectiveness in talent acquisition through AI tools.

• Talent Acquisition Managers: Leaders looking to optimize their recruitment processes and strengthen their employer brand using AI.

By mastering AI applications in recruiting and sourcing, you can accelerate your hiring processes, attract top talent, and maintain a competitive edge in the industry. Enroll now to elevate your recruitment strategies!

Maestría en Generalista de RRHH: La Formación Definitiva en Recursos Humanos


Domina las Responsabilidades del Generalista de RRHH, la Estrategia de RRHH, la Gestión del Talento, el Reclutamiento, la Gestión del Desempeño y la Analítica de RRHH.


El rol del Generalista de RRHH es uno de los más dinámicos, versátiles y esenciales en cualquier organización. Como Generalista de RRHH, eres responsable del reclutamiento, onboarding, compromiso de los empleados, estrategia de RRHH, gestión del desempeño, compensaciones, cultura corporativa, analítica de RRHH y automatización de RRHH.


Este curso integral de Generalista de RRHH está diseñado para proporcionarte todas las habilidades, herramientas y marcos de trabajo necesarios para sobresalir en este rol. Dirigido por el experto en RRHH Mike Pritula, este programa cubre cada función clave del Generalista de RRHH, asegurando que adquieras el conocimiento y la experiencia práctica necesaria para gestionar eficazmente los recursos humanos.


Ya seas un aspirante a Generalista de RRHH, un profesional de RRHH en ejercicio o un reclutador en transición hacia una función de Generalista de RRHH, este curso es la formación más completa de Generalista de RRHH disponible online.

courseDetails.title: How to conduct effective One-on-One (1:1) Meetings [EN]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Employee Coaching | Sync-up Sessions | Leadership Communication | Performance | Mentoring | Active Listening | 1-1 talks
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering 1:1 Meetings: The Ultimate Guide for Managers and HR Professionals


Course Description:

One-on-one (1:1) meetings are a critical tool for managers, HR professionals, and business leaders to drive employee engagement, performance management, coaching, and continuous feedback. This course provides a structured approach to implementing effective 1:1 meetings, covering their purpose, formats, and impact on business efficiency. By the end of this course, you will master the art of conducting meaningful and productive 1:1s that enhance team relationships, optimize performance, and foster a strong company culture.

What You Will Learn:

• The strategic importance of 1:1 meetings in improving employee engagement and business performance.

• Different types of 1:1 meetings and when to use them, from coaching and feedback to burnout prevention and conflict resolution.

• How to build rapport and foster strong manager-employee relationships through structured conversations.

• The GROW coaching model and Google’s coaching techniques for effective leadership.

• Best practices for giving constructive feedback without demotivating employees.

• How to integrate 1:1 meetings into company culture, track ROI, and automate the process for efficiency.

Course Program


Recorded class with feedback on homework


Class 1: Why Businesses Need 1:1 Meetings and How to Structure Them

• Why Google considers 1:1 meetings essential for business success.

• 1:1 meeting format: structure, objectives, and expected outcomes.

• The impact of 1:1 meetings on business efficiency and employee performance.

• Who should conduct 1:1s: Managers, HR professionals, or both?

• Optimal frequency and location for conducting effective 1:1s.


Class 2: Types of 1:1 Meetings and Their Strategic Use

• Performance management 1:1s: setting goals, tracking progress, and improving accountability.

• Relationship-building 1:1s: fostering trust and improving team dynamics.

• Coaching-focused 1:1s: guiding employees through career development.

• Feedback-driven 1:1s: encouraging continuous learning and performance enhancement.

• Diagnosing burnout and preventing disengagement through structured 1:1s.

• Conflict resolution meetings: addressing workplace issues effectively.

• HR-led 1:1s for better employee experience and retention.

• 1:1 meetings for career development and professional growth.


Class 3: Building Strong Employee Relationships Through 1:1s

• How 1:1 meetings strengthen manager-employee interactions.

• Techniques for building rapport and fostering trust.

• Boosting employee engagement and morale through meaningful conversations.

• Making 1:1 meetings an employee’s most valued 30 minutes.


Class 4: Coaching in 1:1 Meetings

• What coaching is and how it works in leadership.

• Google’s coaching techniques for managers.

• The GROW coaching model: how to use it in 1:1 meetings.

• When coaching is appropriate and when alternative approaches are needed.


Class 5: Giving Effective Feedback in 1:1s

• How to give constructive feedback that improves performance.

• The formula for delivering effective feedback in a 1:1 setting.

• How to criticize without demotivating employees.

• Best practices for providing positive feedback that reinforces strengths.


Class 6: Implementing 1:1 Meetings Across the Organization

• Creating a business case for 1:1 meetings to gain executive buy-in.

• Calculating the ROI of 1:1 meetings and measuring their impact.

• Presenting the 1:1 strategy to top management for company-wide adoption.

• Training executives and managers on leading effective 1:1 meetings.

• Tracking, monitoring, and reporting on the effectiveness of 1:1s.

• Automating 1:1 meetings with tools and software for streamlined execution.

Who Should Take This Course?

• Managers and team leaders looking to improve communication and employee performance.

• HR professionals responsible for implementing structured 1:1 meeting programs.

• Business executives aiming to optimize employee engagement and company culture.

• Startups and fast-growing companies that want to establish a strong feedback-driven culture.

Why Take This Course?


Learn from HR expert Mike Pritula, an industry leader in employee engagement and leadership development.

Step-by-step guidance on 1:1 meeting formats, structures, and best practices.

Hands-on exercises, templates, and feedback to help you implement 1:1s effectively.

Flexible online format with recorded lessons and expert feedback.

Certificate of completion to showcase your expertise in running effective 1:1 meetings.

Start Leading High-Impact 1:1 Meetings Today!

courseDetails.title: Programming for Scientific Research with Python and R
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Python and R for Scientific Data Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Conquer Scientific Data with Python and R!

Unleash the power of programming for your research!

This comprehensive, hands-on course equips you with the essential programming skills needed to tackle scientific data analysis and research projects. Whether you're a researcher, student, or simply curious about scientific computing, this course offers a perfect blend of Python and R to empower your scientific journey.

Master the Fundamentals:

  • Gain a solid understanding of both Python and R programming languages.

  • Master core programming concepts like variables, data types, control flow, and functions in both Python and R.

  • Explore the strengths and weaknesses of each language to choose the right tool for your research needs.

Wrangle and Analyze with Confidence:

  • Grasp essential file handling techniques in Python to manage your scientific data effectively.

  • Master data manipulation methods in R to organize and prepare your data for analysis.

  • Leverage powerful libraries like NumPy and SciPy in Python, and core R functionalities to perform statistical calculations crucial for your research.

Visualize Your Findings Clearly:

  • Craft informative and visually appealing graphs using Matplotlib in Python and ggplot2 in R.

  • Communicate your research results through compelling data visualizations, including advanced and animated graphs in R.

Dive into Artificial Intelligence:

  • Get an introduction to AI and apply deep learning techniques to scientific data using Python and R.

  • Explore practical applications like processing geospatial data and analyzing scientific datasets with AI.

Real-World Applications:

  • Apply your programming skills to practical case studies in scientific research.

  • Tackle real-world scenarios, including climate data analysis and remote sensing indices.

By the end of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Confidently navigate the world of scientific computing with Python and R.

  • Clean, manipulate, and analyze your scientific data with ease.

  • Conduct essential statistical analyses to support your research.

  • Apply AI techniques to enhance your data analysis capabilities.

  • Create impactful data visualizations to communicate your findings effectively.

Join us today and start conquering your scientific data with the power of Python and R!
targetAudiences: This course is designed for researchers, students, and anyone interested in using programming languages for scientific computing.

courseDetails.title: Harnessing AI and Machine Learning for Geospatial Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master AI, Deep Learning and ML for Geospatial Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the transformative power of AI, Deep Learning, and Machine Learning in Geospatial Analysis with this comprehensive course using Python and R. This course is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to apply advanced AI techniques to geospatial data, enabling you to solve real-world problems in fields such as agriculture, environmental monitoring, and air quality analysis.

Starting with a strong foundation in Python and R, you'll learn how to manipulate, visualize, and analyze geospatial data effectively. The course covers essential machine learning and deep learning concepts, tailored specifically for geospatial applications, including image classification, plant detection, and environmental data analysis.

Through practical projects and detailed case studies, you'll gain hands-on experience in applying these techniques to real-world scenarios. You'll learn how to preprocess spatial data, develop models, and interpret the results to derive actionable insights.

Whether you're a researcher, analyst, or developer, this course provides a structured path to mastering AI and machine learning in geospatial analysis. By the end of this course, you'll have the confidence and skills to tackle complex geospatial challenges, enhance the accuracy of your data, and drive innovation in your field.

Join us on this journey and start making an impact with AI-driven geospatial analysis today.
targetAudiences: Researchers and Academics: Those working in environmental science, geography, or related fields who want to enhance their data analysis skills with AI and machine learning.  Data Scientists and Analysts: Professionals looking to specialize in geospatial analysis, integrating advanced AI techniques into their existing skill set.  GIS Specialists: Individuals seeking to expand their expertise by incorporating machine learning and deep learning into Geographic Information Systems (GIS). courseDetails.title: Gestión del Tiempo y Timeboxing en Negocios y Organizaciones
courseDetails.shortDescription: Dominio del Timeboxing y Gestión del Tiempo: Potenciando la Productividad y la Eficiencia en los Negocios, Agile y más
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenido al curso: Gestión del Tiempo y Timeboxing en Negocios, Proyectos y Metodologías Ágiles por MTF Institute

Libera tu máximo potencial y alcanza una productividad óptima con "Gestión del Tiempo y Timeboxing en Negocios, Proyectos y Metodologías Ágiles". Este curso integral te proporciona las habilidades y estrategias esenciales para dominar tu tiempo, aumentar tu eficiencia y lograr el éxito en el entorno profesional acelerado de hoy en día.

Este curso profundiza en los principios y aplicaciones prácticas de una gestión del tiempo eficaz, así como en la poderosa técnica del timeboxing. Aprenderás a ir más allá de simplemente gestionar tareas, para gestionar de forma estratégica tu tiempo y energía, lo que te permitirá alcanzar tus metas con mayor enfoque y eficiencia. Exploramos cómo estas metodologías son fundamentales en la gestión empresarial, la gestión de proyectos y entornos ágiles, brindándote una comprensión integral de su impacto en distintos contextos profesionales.

Curso ofrecido por MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF es un instituto global de educación e investigación con sede central en Lisboa, Portugal, centrado en la formación profesional híbrida (presencial y online) en áreas como: Negocios y Administración, Ciencia y Tecnología, Banca y Finanzas.

Su centro de I+D está orientado a la investigación en Inteligencia Artificial, Aprendizaje Automático, Ciencia de Datos, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomonedas y Activos Digitales, Metaversos, Transformación Digital, Fintech, Comercio Electrónico e Internet de las Cosas.

MTF es socio oficial de IBM, Intel y Microsoft, y es miembro de la Cámara de Comercio e Industria Portuguesa.

Está presente en 216 países y ha sido elegido por más de 740.000 estudiantes.


Autores del Curso:

Rebeca Parretta (más de 4 años de experiencia en gestión de proyectos y administración, a cargo de la traducción de este curso).


Resumen del Tema

Gestión del Tiempo:

Es el proceso de planificar y controlar cómo utilizas tu tiempo. Una gestión del tiempo eficaz te permite trabajar de forma más inteligente —no más dura—, logrando hacer más en menos tiempo, incluso cuando las exigencias y la presión son altas.

Implica priorizar tareas, establecer objetivos y utilizar estrategias para aumentar la productividad.

Timeboxing:

Es una técnica específica de gestión del tiempo que consiste en asignar un período fijo —una "caja de tiempo"— para una actividad planificada.

En lugar de trabajar en una tarea hasta completarla, se trabaja en ella dentro del marco de tiempo asignado. Esto ayuda a generar un sentido de urgencia y concentración.

Es una forma eficaz de combatir la procrastinación y asegurarse de que las tareas reciban la atención adecuada, sin excederse.

Descripción del Curso: Gestión del Tiempo y Timeboxing en Negocios, Proyectos y Metodologías Ágiles

Libera tu potencial y alcanza una productividad máxima con este curso completo, diseñado para brindarte habilidades clave y estrategias prácticas que te permitirán dominar tu tiempo, aumentar tu eficiencia y tener éxito en entornos laborales dinámicos.

Contenido del Curso

Habilidades Fundamentales en Gestión del Tiempo

Esta sección sienta las bases de una gestión del tiempo efectiva, con foco en:

  • Comprender la Gestión del Tiempo: Adquiere una comprensión clara de los conceptos y principios clave.

  • Establecer Metas Claras: Aprende a definir y priorizar objetivos para fomentar una acción enfocada.

  • Planificación y Organización del Tiempo: Domina el arte de crear horarios y planes eficaces.

  • Superar la Procrastinación: Desarrolla estrategias prácticas para mantenerte enfocado.

  • Gestionar la Energía, No Solo el Tiempo: Optimiza tus niveles de energía para lograr un rendimiento óptimo.

  • Evaluar y Ajustar tu Plan de Gestión del Tiempo: Mejora continuamente tu enfoque para obtener los mejores resultados.

  • Actividad Interactiva – La Matriz de Eisenhower en Acción: Aplica esta herramienta a situaciones reales para priorizar eficazmente.

Lineamientos para la Gestión del Tiempo y el Timeboxing

Esta sección explora en profundidad el timeboxing y su aplicación en distintos entornos profesionales:

  • Fundamentos de la Gestión del Tiempo e Introducción al Timeboxing: Comprende los principios esenciales.

  • Dominando los Fundamentos del Timeboxing: Define, explora principios y variaciones de esta técnica.

  • Técnicas, Herramientas y Gestión Eficaz de Tareas: Aprende métodos prácticos para implementar el timeboxing.

  • Estrategias de Priorización y Selección de Tareas: Perfecciona la elección de tareas clave.

  • Superar Obstáculos y Optimizar el Flujo de Trabajo: Enfrenta desafíos comunes y mejora la productividad.

  • Aplicación Estratégica en Operaciones Empresariales: Mejora la eficiencia en la empresa mediante el timeboxing.

  • Gestión del Tiempo y Timeboxing en Proyectos: Ejecuta proyectos exitosos con esta técnica.

  • El Timeboxing como Pilar en Metodologías Ágiles: Comprende su rol dentro de marcos ágiles como Scrum o Kanban.

  • Marcos Avanzados y Herramientas Digitales: Explora soluciones tecnológicas y frameworks actuales.

  • Guía Paso a Paso e Implementación con Casos Prácticos: Aprende mediante ejemplos concretos.

  • Conclusión – Tu Camino hacia la Maestría Estratégica del Tiempo: Desarrolla una hoja de ruta para tu crecimiento continuo.

Importancia para Empresas y Directivos

Desarrollar estas habilidades es crucial tanto para empresas como para líderes por múltiples razones:

  • Mayor Productividad:
    Una buena gestión del tiempo y el uso del timeboxing aumentan el rendimiento al reducir el tiempo perdido y maximizar el enfoque.

  • Mejor Eficiencia:
    Priorizar tareas y asignar el tiempo de manera adecuada permite agilizar procesos y evitar retrasos innecesarios.

  • Menos Estrés y Agotamiento:
    Administrar bien el tiempo favorece un equilibrio entre la vida laboral y personal, reduciendo el estrés y previniendo el burnout.

  • Mayor Enfoque y Priorización:
    El timeboxing fomenta la concentración y evita distracciones, ayudando a centrarse en lo verdaderamente importante.

  • Mejor Gestión de Proyectos:
    Estas herramientas ayudan a mantener los proyectos dentro del plazo y del presupuesto, facilitando la asignación de recursos y el seguimiento del progreso.

  • Toma de Decisiones Más Efectiva:
    Un manejo eficiente del tiempo permite tomar decisiones más informadas, sin apresuramientos.

  • Colaboración y Comunicación Mejoradas:
    Cuando todos gestionan bien su tiempo, los equipos trabajan de forma más coordinada y eficiente. Además, el timeboxing puede estructurar reuniones para que sean breves y productivas.

En definitiva, la gestión del tiempo y el timeboxing no son solo habilidades individuales: son fundamentales para el éxito organizacional. Fomentarlas dentro de las empresas contribuye a crear entornos de trabajo más productivos, eficientes y sostenibles.
targetAudiences: Un curso para cualquiera que desee desarrollar una carrera en Negocios, Proyectos o metodologías Ágiles.

courseDetails.title: Practical SQL: Query & Manage Databases
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master SQL Basics, Data Retrieval, Advanced Queries, Joins, and Optimisation + Hands-on Exercises. SQL for Data Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Practical SQL: Query & Manage Databases by MTF Institute


Unlock the Power of Data!

Ready to take control of data and gain an essential skill for today's job market? We're thrilled to announce the launch of our new course, "Practical SQL: Query & Manage Databases"!

In the age of data, proficiency in SQL is non-negotiable for anyone looking to excel in roles like data analyst, software developer, business intelligence professional, and beyond. Whether you're a complete beginner or aiming to level up your database skills, this course is designed to provide you with a solid, hands-on foundation in SQL.


What will you learn?

Our curriculum guides you from the basics to advanced techniques, ensuring you gain practical, job-ready skills:

  • Fundamentals First: Get introduced to SQL and databases, starting with basic commands to interact with data.

  • Mastering Data Retrieval: Learn to use powerful SELECT statements, filter, and sort data for valuable insights.

  • Advanced Querying: Dive into data aggregation, working with JOIN operations to combine data from multiple tables, and constructing complex queries with subqueries.

  • Data Manipulation: Gain confidence in modifying data using INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements.

  • Performance Matters: Understand query optimization and indexing techniques crucial for efficient database interactions in real-world applications.

  • Exploring Advanced Features: Discover additional advanced SQL capabilities.

Through clear explanations and extensive hands-on exercises, you'll build the confidence to effectively query, manipulate, and manage databases. The course culminates in a practical final project where you'll apply your new skills to solve real-world data challenges.


By the end of this course, you will be able to:

  • Write fundamental SQL commands.

  • Retrieve, filter, and manipulate data effectively.

  • Construct complex queries using joins and subqueries.

  • Utilize aggregate functions for data analysis.

  • Modify data within databases.

  • Implement basic query optimization and indexing.

  • Solve practical data problems using SQL.


Designed for everyone:

No prior database experience is necessary! This course is perfect for aspiring data professionals, developers, and anyone eager to work effectively with data.

Don't miss this opportunity to master SQL and unlock a world of data possibilities.

Enroll now and take your first step towards becoming a data-savvy professional!


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 217 countries and has been chosen by more than 775000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Course Description

Unlock the power of data with our comprehensive and practical SQL course! Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to enhance your database skills, this course provides a solid foundation in SQL, the standard language for interacting with databases. Through a blend of clear theoretical explanations and extensive hands-on exercises, you'll gain the confidence and proficiency to effectively query, manipulate, and manage data.

We start with the fundamentals, introducing you to basic SQL commands and gradually progress to more advanced techniques. You'll learn how to retrieve specific information using powerful SELECT statements, filter and sort data to gain valuable insights, and manipulate data within tables. Dive into the world of advanced queries, mastering aggregate functions to summarise data and understand trends.

Discover the crucial skill of combining data from multiple tables using JOIN operations, and learn to construct sophisticated queries with subqueries and nested queries. Beyond just querying, you'll gain practical knowledge in modifying data using INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements. A significant portion of the course is dedicated to optimising your SQL queries and understanding indexing techniques to ensure your database interactions are efficient and fast, crucial for real-world applications.

The course culminates in a practical final project where you can apply your newly acquired skills to solve real-world data challenges. We also include a dedicated session for final assessment preparation and provide a curated list of recommended resources to continue your SQL journey.


By the end of this course, you will be able to:

  • Write fundamental SQL commands to interact with databases.

  • Retrieve, filter, and manipulate data effectively using various SQL clauses.

  • Construct and execute complex queries using joins and subqueries.

  • Utilize aggregate functions to analyse and summarise data.

  • Modify data within SQL databases using insert, update, and delete operations.

  • Understand and implement basic query optimisation and indexing techniques.

  • Apply your SQL skills to solve practical data-related problems.


This course is designed for anyone eager to work with data, including aspiring data analysts, software developers, business intelligence professionals, and students. No prior database experience is necessary – we'll guide you every step of the way. Enrol now and take your first step towards mastering the essential skill of SQL!
targetAudiences: Aspiring data analysts, developers, business professionals, and anyone wanting to understand and work with databases effectively

courseDetails.title: ISO 9001:2026–Understanding and Implementing the New Changes
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master ISO 9001:2026 changes: leadership, risk-based thinking, digital QMS, sustainability, audits, transition planning
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course contains the use of artificial intelligence. Led by Dr. Amar Massoud, a seasoned expert with decades of academic and professional experience, it combines cutting-edge AI support with human insight to deliver content that is precise, practical, and easy to follow. You’ll gain the clarity of structured learning and the confidence of being guided by a recognized authority.

ISO 9001 is the world’s most widely adopted quality management standard—and the ISO 9001:2026 revision represents one of the most significant shifts in how quality, leadership, digitalization, and sustainability are addressed. This course is designed to help professionals clearly understand what has changed, why it has changed, and how to implement those changes effectively within real organizations.

Rather than simply listing clause updates, this course takes a practical, implementation-focused approach. You will explore the evolution from ISO 9001:2015 to ISO 9001:2026, with clear explanations of new expectations around leadership behavior, quality culture, risk-based thinking, digital QMS validation, data integrity, and sustainability integration. Each change is linked directly to operational impact, audit expectations, and transition planning.

You will also learn how certification bodies are likely to interpret the new requirements, how to conduct gap assessments, build transition roadmaps, and prepare for internal and external audits under ISO 9001:2026. Realistic examples and a detailed model company case study (QualityWorks Manufacturing Ltd.) are used throughout the course to demonstrate how the standard can be applied in practice.

This course is ideal for professionals who want to move beyond theory and gain confidence, clarity, and readiness for ISO 9001:2026—whether you are preparing for transition, supporting audits, or advising organizations on quality management modernization.

By the end of this course, you will be equipped to lead, support, or audit ISO 9001:2026 implementation with credibility and confidence.
targetAudiences: Quality managers, ISO 9001 practitioners, internal auditors, consultants, and professionals responsible for QMS transition to ISO 9001:2026.

courseDetails.title: Excel Power Pivot desde Cero
courseDetails.shortDescription: De cero a ninja de datos
courseDetails.longDescription:
En este curso enseño cómo construir modelos de datos profesionales en Excel, llevando tus habilidades de análisis a un nivel completamente nuevo. Comenzamos aprendiendo a importar y transformar información de diferentes fuentes, lo que te permitirá tener todos tus datos organizados de manera eficiente y listos para el análisis. A continuación, profundizamos en la creación de relaciones entre tablas, que es fundamental para aprovechar el verdadero poder de Power Pivot y poder combinar información de manera lógica y coherente.

Aprenderás también a crear columnas calculadas y medidas, utilizando DAX, el lenguaje de fórmulas de Power Pivot, lo que te permitirá realizar cálculos complejos de forma dinámica según el contexto del informe. Además, enseñamos a diseñar KPI (Indicadores Clave de Desempeño) que te ayudarán a medir y visualizar el rendimiento de tu negocio o proyectos de manera clara e intuitiva.

A lo largo del curso, trabajamos con ejemplos prácticos y reales que te permitirán aplicar cada concepto inmediatamente. También exploramos cómo construir análisis dinámicos y paneles interactivos, para que tus reportes sean no solo precisos, sino fáciles de interpretar y mantener. Al finalizar, serás capaz de transformar grandes volúmenes de datos en información valiosa, tomar decisiones fundamentadas y presentar tus resultados de manera profesional. Este curso es ideal para quienes buscan dominar Power Pivot desde cero y desarrollar habilidades avanzadas de análisis de datos en Excel.
targetAudiences: A personas que trabajan con Excel y quieren llevar su análisis al siguiente nivel mediante modelos de datos y automatización.
A analistas, administrativos, contables y responsables de reporting que necesitan consolidar información desde múltiples tablas o archivos.
A estudiantes o profesionales que desean aprender Power Pivot y DAX desde cero, sin conocimientos previos.
A quienes quieran mejorar sus habilidades para crear reportes más rápidos, dinámicos y profesionales.
A usuarios de Excel interesados en dar el salto hacia herramientas más avanzadas, como Power BI, comenzando por Power Pivot.

courseDetails.title: Network Mastery for Ethical Hackers
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Network Security: A Comprehensive Course for Ethical Hackers
courseDetails.longDescription:
Embark on a transformative journey into the realm of cybersecurity with our comprehensive course, 'Mastering Network Security for Ethical Hackers.' This meticulously crafted program is designed to equip you with a deep understanding of the fundamental principles and advanced techniques that underpin secure network environments.

The course begins with an insightful 'Introduction,' laying the groundwork for your exploration into the intricacies of network security. Delve into the 'Basics of Networking' and unravel the key components that form the backbone of modern communication systems. Understand the 'Goals of Network Security' as you navigate through the intricate landscape of safeguarding information.

Grasp the nuances of 'Network Protocols' and gain hands-on experience with 'Hardware Internet Devices.' Navigate the layers of the 'OSI model' and decipher the significance of the '3-way Handshake' in secure communications. Dive into the world of 'IP Addresses,' 'DHCP,' and 'DNS,' mastering the essential elements that define network configurations.

Explore advanced topics like 'Subnetting,' 'SNMP,' 'ARP,' 'Wi-Fi,' and 'Nmap,' honing your skills to proactively identify and mitigate potential security threats. This course provides a holistic approach, ensuring you not only comprehend theoretical concepts but also gain practical experience through real-world scenarios.

Whether you're an aspiring ethical hacker or a seasoned professional, this course caters to all levels of expertise. Elevate your skills, safeguard digital landscapes, and become a proficient ethical hacker with 'Mastering Network Security for Ethical Hackers.
targetAudiences: Cybersecurity Enthusiasts.
Security Analysts and Engineers.

courseDetails.title: Profesyonel Kariyer Planlama: Beyaz Yakalı Yol Haritası
courseDetails.shortDescription: Beyaz yakalı olmak veya kurumsal hayatta yükselmek isteyenler için adım adım kariyer planı ve modern başarı stratejileri
courseDetails.longDescription:
Merhaba, ben Onur Terzi. Bugüne kadar edindiğim iş ve kariyer tecrübelerini bu eğitim kapsamında sizlerle paylaşacağım. Beyaz yakalı olarak çalışmak isteyen ve bu alanda kariyer hedeflerine odaklanan kişiler bu eğitim tam sizin için..

Neler mi öğreneceksiniz ?

1. Öncelikle kendinizi tanıyarak doğru seçimler yapabilmeyi

2. Kariyer planlamasının ne demek olduğunu

3. Kariyer yolculuğunun ne anlama geldiğini ve bu yolculukta karşınıza çıkabilecek sorunları

4. Kişileri, olayları, projeleri, işleri ve tüm bu karmaşık dengelerin ne anlama geldiğini

5. Ve Son olarak da iş ilişkilerinizi nasıl geliştireceğinizi öğreneceksiniz

Bu 5 önemli konu başlığı size kariyer planlamanızda ve kariyer yolculuğunuzda yol gösterecek ve problemlerle başa çıkmayı öğretecek.


Beyaz yakalı bir çalışanın kariyer yolculuğu zordur ve geleneksel metotlar çoğu zaman işe yaramaz..

Zaten herkesin bu konudaki deneyimi sadece o kişilere aittir. Yani genellikle bir kişinin kariyer yolculuğu bir diğer kişi ile benzemez. Bu nedenle oldukça kişisel bir konudan bahsediyoruz.

Ancak kişisel bir konu olması sizin yalnız olacağınız anlamına gelmez. Çünkü kariyer yolculuğu tek kişilik bir yolculuk değildir. Bu yolda nasıl yürümeniz gerektiğini bu eğitimde göreceksiniz..

Bu kursun sonunda beyaz yakalı bir çalışan olabilmek için kariyer planınızı nasıl yapacağınızı, nelere dikkat etmeniz gerektiğini, neler yaparsanız başarısız olacağınızı ve genel olarak beyaz yaka iş hayatı konusunda bilgiler edineceksiniz. Tüm katılımcılar için başarı diliyorum.
targetAudiences: Yeni mezunlar ve kariyerine yeni başlayan profesyoneller
Orta düzey yöneticiler ve uzmanlar

courseDetails.title: Certificat Professionnel en Gestion des Risques
courseDetails.shortDescription: Risques, gestion des risques, définitions et concepts, risques stratégiques, financiers, opérationnels et de conformité.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenue au programme : Certificat Professionnel en Gestion des Risques par le MTF Institute

Cours fourni par le MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.

MTF est un institut éducatif et de recherche global basé à Lisbonne, Portugal, axé sur l'éducation hybride (en présentiel et en ligne) pour les professionnels et les entreprises dans des domaines tels que : la Gestion des Entreprises, la Science et la Technologie, la Banque et la Finance.

Le centre de R&D de MTF se concentre sur des activités de recherche dans des domaines tels que : l'Intelligence Artificielle, l'Apprentissage Automatique, la Science des Données, le Big Data, le WEB3, la Blockchain, les Cryptomonnaies et les Actifs Numériques, les Métavers, la Transformation Numérique, la Fintech, le Commerce Électronique et l'Internet des Objets.

MTF est partenaire officiel de : IBM, Intel, Microsoft, et membre de la Chambre de Commerce et d'Industrie Portugaise.

MTF est présent dans 216 pays et a été choisi par plus de 740 000 étudiants.



Autrice du cours :

La Dr. Alex Amoroso est une professionnelle expérimentée avec une vaste expérience dans les domaines académique et industriel, spécialisée dans les méthodologies de recherche, la formulation de stratégies et le développement de produits. Titulaire d'un doctorat à l'École des Sciences Sociales et Politiques à Lisbonne, Portugal, où elle a été honorée pour sa recherche exemplaire, Alex Amoroso apporte une grande expertise et expérience.

En plus de ses études doctorales, Mme Amoroso a été professeure invitée, dispensant des cours à un large éventail d'étudiants, de la licence aux étudiants en affaires dans des cours professionnels et exécutifs. Actuellement, à l'EIMT à Zurich, Suisse, elle enseigne aux étudiants en doctorat, offrant un enseignement avancé sur la conception de recherches et les méthodologies, et au MTF Institute, Mme Amoroso dirige le domaine académique du Développement de Produits.

En combinant l'expérience académique et professionnelle, Mme Amoroso a obtenu de grands résultats dans sa carrière en dirigeant des activités de R&D, de développement de produits, de stratégie et d'analyse de marché dans divers secteurs. Elle a mis en œuvre les meilleures pratiques du marché dans des industries telles que la Banque et la Finance, le PropTech, le Conseil et la Recherche, ainsi que dans des Startups Innovantes.

La production scientifique d’Alex Amoroso est vaste et comprend de nombreux articles publiés dans des revues scientifiques reconnues ainsi que des présentations orales et des affiches lors de conférences internationales. Ses travaux de recherche ont été présentés dans des institutions de renom telles que l'École des Sciences Politiques et Sociales et la Conférence Stressed Out à UCL, entre autres.

Passionnée par la collaboration interdisciplinaire et déterminée à impulser un changement positif, Alex Amoroso est dédiée à la formation des étudiants et des professionnels dans l'utilisation de méthodologies de pointe pour atteindre l'excellence dans le monde des affaires global.


Khadija M'tag, traductrice du programme, possède une solide expérience en finance, en formation et en traduction professionnelle. Elle a participé à plusieurs projets financiers, animé des formations, et travaille actuellement avec des clients internationaux à qui elle apporte son expertise.


Dans un environnement commercial en constante évolution et de plus en plus complexe, la capacité à anticiper, évaluer et gérer les risques est devenue une compétence indispensable pour toute organisation souhaitant assurer sa pérennité et atteindre ses objectifs stratégiques. Notre cours complet sur la Gestion des Risques vous offre les connaissances fondamentales et les outils pratiques nécessaires pour naviguer avec succès dans ce paysage incertain.

Ce programme est conçu pour vous doter d'une compréhension approfondie et d'une maîtrise pratique des diverses facettes de la gestion des risques :

  • Introduction aux Fondamentaux : Vous débuterez par une compréhension approfondie de ce qu'est un risque, ses différentes typologies (stratégiques, opérationnels, financiers, de conformité, de réputation) et l'importance cruciale d'une approche proactive. Nous explorerons les processus clés et les avantages d'une gestion des risques efficace, y compris les concepts d'appétit et de tolérance au risque, et l'impact d'une culture du risque positive.

  • Identification et Évaluation Précise : Découvrez les techniques systématiques pour identifier les risques potentiels (brainstorming, analyse SWOT, scénarios, données historiques). Vous apprendrez ensuite à évaluer la probabilité d'occurrence et l'impact potentiel de chaque risque, en utilisant des outils comme les matrices de risques pour une hiérarchisation efficace et une documentation rigoureuse.

  • Cadres et Processus Structurés : Explorez les cadres de référence reconnus mondialement comme COSO ERM, ISO 31000 et NIST, qui fournissent des principes et des lignes directrices pour une gestion cohérente. Vous comprendrez l'importance des processus bien définis et comment intégrer la gestion des risques dans la planification stratégique, la prise de décision et les opérations quotidiennes de votre organisation.

  • Stratégies de Traitement et d'Atténuation : Maîtrisez les quatre grandes options de traitement des risques – l'évitement, l'atténuation, le transfert et l'acceptation. Le cours détaillera l'élaboration de plans de traitement des risques et la mise en place de contrôles efficaces (préventifs, détectives, correctifs), tout en abordant le concept crucial de risque résiduel.

  • Gestion des Risques Spécifiques : Plongez dans les spécificités de la Gestion du Risque Opérationnel (erreurs humaines, défaillances systèmes, perturbations de la chaîne d'approvisionnement), du Risque Financier (risque de marché, de crédit, de liquidité) et du Risque de Cybersécurité (malware, phishing, violations de données). Chaque section inclura des exemples concrets et les meilleures pratiques sectorielles pour une application pertinente.

  • Risques Émergents et Tendances Futures : Anticipez les défis de demain en identifiant les risques émergents liés au changement climatique, aux instabilités géopolitiques, aux perturbations de la chaîne d'approvisionnement et aux nouvelles technologies (Intelligence Artificielle, Internet des Objets). Découvrez comment les tendances comme l'intégration des risques, la résilience organisationnelle et les considérations ESG (Environnementales, Sociales et de Gouvernance) façonnent l'avenir de la gestion des risques.

  • Gouvernance, Conformité et Reporting : Comprenez le rôle essentiel de la gouvernance des risques, le rôle du conseil d'administration et de la direction, l'importance de la conformité aux réglementations et normes (ex: RGPD, Bâle III), et les meilleures pratiques de reporting pour assurer la transparence et la responsabilité à tous les niveaux de l'organisation.

  • Éthique et Standards Professionnels : Abordez les principes éthiques fondamentaux et les normes professionnelles (tels que ceux de la GARP) qui sont le pilier d'une pratique responsable et intègre de la gestion des risques. Vous apprendrez à naviguer dans les dilemmes éthiques et à cultiver une culture éthique forte au sein de votre organisation.


En complétant ce programme, vous serez mieux équipé pour prendre des décisions éclairées, protéger la valeur de votre entreprise et transformer les défis en opportunités.

Rejoignez-nous et devenez un acteur clé de la sécurité et de la réussite de votre organisation !
targetAudiences: Professionnels de la finance et de la comptabilité

courseDetails.title: All in One WP Migration: Migra tu Sitio Web de WordPress
courseDetails.shortDescription: Migra tu sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting, sin saber de programación, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS APRENDER A MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING?


Únete a nuestro curso para mostrarte cómo migrar un sitio web de WordPress completo a otro dominio o hosting, para dicho proceso, vamos utilizar el plugin All in One WP Migration.


All in One WP Migration es un plugin que facilita la migración de un sitio hecho en WordPress de forma rápida y sencilla.


Permite exportar todo el contenido como entradas, post, plugins, base de datos, imágenes, temas, etc.


Para realizar este proceso no necesitas ningún tipo de conocimiento técnico ni de programación, ya que se realiza de una forma fácil y veloz.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin All in One WP Migration, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Instalar el plugin All-in-One WP Migration.

  • Dar clic al botón de exportar para compilar tu base de datos, archivos de medios, plugins, y temas en un archivo compacto.

  • Desempacar el archivo en la nueva ubicación o dominio con una función de “arrastrar y soltar” fácil de usar en el panel de WordPress de tu nuevo sitio web.



¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo instalar correctamente el plugin All in One WP Migration.

  • Cómo migrar correctamente un sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting.

  • Cómo exportar tu sitio web de WordPress desde tu dominio actual.

  • Cómo importar tu sitio web de WordPress a un nuevo dominio.

  • Cómo actualizar las URLS de la Base de Datos de tu sitio web migrado.

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página de Ventas Para Hotmart 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página de ventas para Hotmart, de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿QUIERES CREAR UNA PÁGINA DE VENTAS PARA HOTMART Y AUMENTAR TUS INGRESOS POR MARKETING DE AFILIACIÓN?


Hotmart es una plataforma de venta de cursos modelo Marketplace, fundada en 2011. Con más de 7 millones de usuarios en todo el mundo y transacciones que superan los mil millones de dólares anuales. Se ha consolidado como el líder en ventas de infoproductos en Latinoamérica y mundialmente solo detrás de Udemy.


Actualmente Hotmart tiene más de 420,000 infoproductos registrados, más de 30 millones de usuarios registrados y presencia en más de 190 países.

Esta plataforma consigue ganar dinero a través del cobro por comisiones por la venta de cada curso.


La principal diferencia de Hotmart respecto a otras plataformas para venta de cursos modelo MarketPlace, es que Hotmart cuenta con una estructura un poco más compleja, y tiene más variables en juego, siendo la más relevante y diferencial «el afiliado».

El afiliado se encarga de promocionar y vender los infoproductos de Hotmart, solucionando así uno de los principales problemas de los creadores de contenidos, así es hablamos de las ventas.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una página de ventas en WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestra página de ventas en WordPress, utilizando los temas y opciones de diseño que nos brinda el constructor visual, que llevarán su página de ventas al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página de ventas en WordPress, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su página de ventas diseñada con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu página de ventas.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear páginas de ventas con WordPress y Elementor desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu página de ventas de forma profesional.

  • Cómo adaptar tu página de ventas para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página de Ventas Para Hotmart", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 175,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear una página de ventas con WordPress y Elementor de forma rápida y sencilla.

Graphic design is no longer a luxury—it’s a necessity in today’s visually-driven world. We start with the fundamentals. You’ll learn how to set up your Canva account, navigate the interface, and use its essential tools. By understanding Canva’s dashboard, templates, and design options, you’ll be ready to start creating in no time.

Once you’ve mastered the basics, we’ll dive deeper. You’ll explore advanced features like text effects, photo editing, layering, and custom templates. You’ll learn how to use grids, frames, and gradients to enhance your designs, ensuring they stand out from the crowd.

With step-by-step guidance and practical projects, you’ll build a versatile portfolio showcasing your skills.

4. Monetize Your Canva Skills
Graphic design is not just a skill—it’s a lucrative opportunity. This course teaches you how to turn your Canva expertise into a source of income. You’ll learn to:

  • Use LinkedIn effectively to showcase your designs and attract clients.

  • Tap into freelance platforms and other earning opportunities.

  • Build and sell your own Canva templates, graphics, and design services.

5. Gain Confidence and Build Your Creative Portfolio
Throughout the course, you’ll work on hands-on projects that allow you to apply your knowledge in real-world scenarios. By the end, you’ll have a diverse portfolio that highlights your expertise and boosts your confidence as a designer.

What Sets This Course Apart?

Step-by-Step Learning: Each module is carefully structured to ensure you learn at your own pace. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced, you’ll find value in every lesson.

Real-World Applications: This course focuses on practical, actionable skills. You won’t just learn how to use Canva—you’ll learn how to create designs that solve real-world problems and meet industry standards.

Monetization Strategies: Many courses teach design, but few show you how to earn money with your skills. This course provides actionable steps to monetize your Canva expertise, turning your passion into profit.

Expert Guidance: Our instructors have years of experience in design and teaching. You’ll benefit from their insights, tips, and best practices.

Who Is This Course For?

This course is designed for anyone who wants to learn Canva and use it effectively:

  • Beginners who want to start designing with no prior experience.

  • Small Business Owners looking to create professional marketing materials without hiring a designer.

  • Freelancers and Entrepreneurs interested in offering design services or selling templates.

  • Students and Professionals aiming to enhance their design skills for career growth.

  • Content Creators and Marketers who want to elevate their social media and branding.

Course Modules at a Glance

Module 1: Introduction to Canva

  • What is Canva?

  • Setting up your account and navigating the interface.

Module 2: Canva Basics

  • Exploring the dashboard and template library.

  • Adding and editing text, images, and shapes.

  • Advanced text techniques, photo editing tools, and special effects.

Module 4–19: Real-World Projects

  • Design YouTube thumbnails, Facebook ads, Instagram posts, and more.

  • Create book covers, t-shirt graphics, and promotional materials.

Module 20: Monetize Your Skills

  • Leverage LinkedIn to showcase your portfolio and attract clients.

  • Explore additional platforms for earning through design.

What Makes Canva a Game-Changer?

Canva isn’t just a design tool—it’s a platform that empowers creativity. Its user-friendly features make it accessible to beginners, while its advanced capabilities cater to professionals. By mastering Canva, you’ll be able to:

  • Save time and money by creating your own designs.

  • Build a brand identity that sets you apart.

  • Offer design services to clients and generate income.

What You’ll Achieve by the End of This Course

By completing this course, you’ll:

  • Master Canva’s tools and features, from basic to advanced.

  • Build a diverse portfolio of projects, including social media graphics, book covers, and merchandise designs.

  • Gain the confidence to tackle any design challenge and stand out in the competitive design world.

Are You Ready to Begin?

If you’re ready to unlock your creative potential, build practical skills, and start earning with Canva, this course is for you. Whether you want to design for fun, enhance your business, or kickstart a freelance career, this course will equip you with everything you need to succeed.

Enroll now and take the first step toward becoming a Canva expert. Let’s turn your creativity into a powerful skill—and a profitable one!

courseDetails.title: Complete UI/UX Design with Canva - Design Smart Interface
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build stunning user interfaces and experiences, from wireframing to interactive prototypes.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Have you ever wondered how to design a beautiful, user-friendly mobile app or website, but felt intimidated by complex software like Figma or Adobe XD? This course is your perfect starting point! We will demystify the world of UI (User Interface) and UX (User Experience) design and show you how to create stunning designs using a tool you already know and love: Canva.

This course is designed for absolute beginners with zero prior experience in design. Forget the steep learning curve of traditional design tools—we'll use Canva's intuitive features to teach you the fundamental principles of design thinking, user research, wireframing, and creating high-fidelity prototypes. By the end of this course, you won't just be a Canva user; you'll be a confident UI/UX designer with a portfolio-ready project.

Why Canva for UI/UX Design?

Canva isn’t just for social media and presentations—it’s a powerful, free platform that’s rapidly being adopted by startups, marketers, and freelancers for UI/UX design. Its intuitive interface and vast design library make it ideal for rapid prototyping, mockups, and interface presentations


What You'll Learn

  • Master the Core Concepts: Clearly understand the difference between UI and UX design and how they work together to create an exceptional user experience.

  • The UX Design Process: Walk through the entire design process, from conducting user research and creating user personas to building sitemaps and user flows.

  • Wireframing & Prototyping: Learn to create low-fidelity wireframes and turn them into interactive, high-fidelity prototypes that look and feel like a real app or website.

  • UI Design Principles: Apply fundamental design principles like typography, color theory, spacing, and hierarchy to create visually appealing and professional interfaces.

  • Canva for UI/UX: Discover powerful, hidden features in Canva that are perfect for UI/UX work, including frames, Smartmockups, and the prototyping feature.

  • Create a Portfolio: Learn how to present your completed projects to potential employers or clients, helping you kickstart your career in design.

By the end of this course, you’ll be able to design smart, modern interfaces with confidence—without needing to learn complex design software or code.

Ready to start designing smarter? Let’s dive in.

courseDetails.title: Make a Flappy Bird Game From Scratch in Unity 6 & C#
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the fundamentals of 2D game development with Unity 6 by building out a complete game from scratch.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Unity Fundamentals Quickly!

A complex game engine such as Unity can seem daunting at first, but this course will cover all the basics clearly with the development of a complete game like the iconic "Flappy Bird".

I believe we learn best by doing so I skip the fluff and dive right into making the game from the start, explaining every step, every component and every line of code along the way.

Not only do I explain what I am doing, but perhaps even more importantly, why I am doing it.

Build And Modify a Full Game

We start with a blank project and build out a fully playable game with basic physics, animation and even a "slowmo death cam" in just under 2 hours!

A hands-on approach is proven to improve how much of the information you retain, therefore the course presents multiple ideas for how you can tweak the game to make it your own and practice your skills.

A Completely Free Course to Get You Started

This course is presented as a completely free tutorial to which you will have lifetime access. You will never be asked to pay anything and the course is standalone; nothing else is required and there are no pre-requisites. No matter where you're starting from, by the end of this course you'll have a fully working and hopefully fun game to play and tweak!
targetAudiences: Complete beginners to game development
Anyone interested in making 2D games
Anyone wanting to get started with the Unity engine
